mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, username, password, gender, header, phone, education, college_name, title, sign, province, city, weight) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{header,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collegeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, header = #{header,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, college_name = #{collegeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, gender, header, phone, education, college_name, title, sign, province, city, weight from t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, username, password, gender, header, phone, education, college_name, title, sign, province, city, weight from t_user where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, username, password, gender, header, phone, education, college_name, title, sign, province, city, weight from t_user
